Text: Amendment to the ISDA Master Agreement between WestLB and Enron Capital Trade Resources now Enron North America CorpTana Pursuant to our telephone discussions attached please find our proposed Amendment referenced above See attached file NAME CHANGE AMENDMENT JUL doc With regard to your comments on our request for a replacement Guarantee for purposes of proper record keeping consistency and as a matter of market practice we would appreciate a replacement Guarantee substantially the same as the existing Guarantee except for the name change Upon receipt of the new Guarantee we will arrange to return the existing Guarantee to you Please do not hesitate to contact me with any comments or questions I look forward to working with you to finalize the Amendment Best regards Joyce Lim WestLB Legal Department Avenue of the Americas New York NY Phone Fax Confidentiality Message This message contains confidential information and is intended only for the individual named If you are not the named addressee you should not disseminate distribute or copy this email Please notify the sender immediately by email if you have received this email by mistake and delete this email from your system Email transmission cannot be guaranteed to be secure or errorfree as information could be intercepted corrupted lost destroyed arrive late or incomplete or contain viruses The sender therefore does not accept liability for any errors or omissions in the contents of this message which arise as a result of email transmission If verification is required please request a hardcopy version This message is provided for informational purposes and should not be construed as a solicitation or offer to buy or sell any securities or related financial instruments T NAME CHANGE AMENDMENT JUL doc
